info.author: Sebastian 'CrosRoad95' Jura
info.description: Adds chatbubbles above the player's heads!

setting.name: *DefaultTime
setting.desc: The default time every bubble will be visible.

setting.name: *PerCharacterAddition
setting.desc: The time every character in a message adds to the total time visible.

setting.name: *MaxBubbles
setting.desc: The max number of bubbles stacked above one's head. To disable enter 'false'.

setting.name: *HideOwn
setting.desc: Decides whether players are able to see their own bubbles or not.
